advice_mild: Mild fever can occur during recovery. Offer fluids and rest; recheck in 4 hours.
advice_high: High temperature—follow your after‑visit instructions and contact your care line or seek care if persistent.

advice_spike: Pain is higher than expected. Use your prescribed pain plan and consider contacting your provider if not improving within 12 hours.

advice: Repeated vomiting can lead to dehydration; call your clinic if your child cannot keep fluids down.
If your child is working hard to breathe or lips look blue, seek urgent care now.
Resume medicines as prescribed. If unsure what to do after missed doses, call your clinic or pharmacist.
